skins.shipDescription: First ship of special Type II Ayanami class destroyers, Ayanami.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Ayanami, an improved Fubuki-class destroyer. I am not afraid of combat. Though just a destroyer, I can fight any enemy...
skins.acquisition: I'm... Ayanami. I am often called the "Demon." Pleasure to meet you.
skins.login: Commander, have you eaten yet? Here's some snacks.
skins.details: I've inspected the communication equipment. It won't cause any more problems...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ayanami's ears... are they cute? I don't understand... As long as you're happy, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I've been having nightmares of all the girls getting lost... I'm certain that it's my fault, too...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander? No, nothing. I just wanted to see if you were here or not.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... please... don't touch there so much... It's making me feel weird...
skins.secretaryHeadpat: I don't really get it but... I'm a bit happy...

skins.shipDescription: Ayanami, retrofit complete. I feel stronger, yes... Having that said, Commander, can you pat my head? I want to be spoiled a bit...
skins.acquisition: Ayanami, retrofit complete. I feel stronger, yes... Having that said, Commander, can you pat my head? I want to be pampered a bit...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I feel like I can work a bit harder when I'm with you...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Being with everyone makes me happy... so I want to be able to stay together...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you leave me alone... I'll be hurt...

skins.shipDescription: I'm still... your Ayanami... though I'm not very used to this outfit... Commander, does it suit me?
skins.acquisition: I'm still... your Ayanami... though I'm not very used to this outfit... Commander, does it suit me?
skins.login: No matter where you go, Ayanami shall always walk three steps behind you. Commander... shall we go?
skins.details: Now, I know that I'm not alone anymore... because you're here after all, Commander...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'm not sure... I understand the meaning of these clothes... but since you'd like me to wear them, I don't mind...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Everyone was staring at me so excitedly... I'm not used to this...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I like cuddling with you like this... It feels nice.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This feels... a bit weird after all... But, if you like it, I don't mind...

skins.shipDescription: I heard that... I need to wear a costume like this to participate in Halloween festivities. Commander... do I look cute?
skins.acquisition: I heard that... I need to wear a costume like this to participate in Halloween festivities. Commander... do I look cute?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Are these... sweets? Thank you. I will try them.
skins.secretaryIdle2: There are fun things outside of combat and training too...
skins.secretaryIdle3: If I stand on this pumpkin lantern... will I be closer to reaching the skies?
skins.secretaryTouch: I think... I like this costume.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Tonight, I am not a demon... but a witch!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, want to listen to music together? Do you like... this non-combat-oriented Ayanami?
skins.acquisition: Commander, want to listen to music together? Do you like... this non-combat-oriented Ayanami?
skins.login: Commander, before work starts, want to listen to music together?
skins.details: When I put on my headphones, the music flows and washes away everything in the world... except you...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, Javelin asked if I could play later. Is that okay?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, what kind of music do you like? I like... um, rock?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ikazuchi said she was playing something called a "mobage." Commander, do you know what that is?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ayanami's riggings... can also become musical instruments. Commander, do you want to hear me play?

skins.shipDescription: Compared to the way we celebrate New Year in the Sakura Empire, the festivities of the Dragon Empery have a completely different atmosphere... But, I don't really mind the liveliness... Commander, do you like festivals?
skins.acquisition: Compared to the way we celebrate New Year in the Sakura Empire, the festivities of the Dragon Empery have a completely different atmosphere... But, I don't really mind the liveliness... Commander, do you like festivals?
skins.login: Commander, the girls from the Dragon Empery seem to be having a banquet... Want to come with me to have a look?
skins.details: This outfit feels light and easy to move in, not bad at all... Very cute? Um... thank you...
skins.secretaryIdle1: This year's zodiac animal is... Eh? Commander, did you see where the piglet ran off to?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are we under attack? I hear a lot of explosions... Eh? So those are a form of celebration? That sounds interesting, yes...
skins.secretaryIdle3: What is this "ding-a-ling" sound? It reminds me... of our New Year back home...
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, this dress is made with really comfortable materials... Want to feel...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, you can't... lift that part...

skins.shipDescription: "Welcome, Commander..." I should greet customers like this... yes?
skins.acquisition: "Welcome, Commander..." I should greet customers like this... yes?
skins.login: Commander, what would you like to order today? The menu is right here...
skins.details: Training to be a waitress is something that Ayanami has never experienced before. It's very novel, yes...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Laffey said that it's important to diversify your diet. So... today, would you like something sweet, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Javelin is always so energetic, no matter what she's doing. I'm a little jealous...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Being a waitress... is harder work than I imagined...
skins.secretaryTouch: I should hold the serving platter... like this? Commander, are you trying to help me? It's okay, I think I can manage on my own.

skins.shipDescription: Ayanami here. Successfully infiltrated Commander's office. Oh... Commander saw me. Operation failed...
skins.acquisition: Ayanami here. Successfully infiltrated Commander's office. Oh... Commander saw me. Operation failed...
skins.login: Commander, want to join Ayanami in cover ops training? ...Hmm, actually, that seems futile.
skins.details: Even though we were supposed to use our codenames, Kaga just went and spilled the beans. It's a bit troublesome when nobody is going to use them...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Those Cloak of Invisibility things that they have in the Royal Navy are really cool... they make me a bit jealous...
skins.secretaryIdle2: When I need help, I usually turn to Shouhou or Zed. As for Fubuki... she always hears me out on a variety of stuff. I'm very thankful.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This cloak that Yuubari developed for me... has a function that "always conceals its wearer's face." That's... probably good.
skins.secretaryIdle4: Commander's office is always protected, and it is absolutely safe. There's no need to worry.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, want an apple? They're really good.

skins.JPClientName: おませアイドル?困惑中
skins.shipDescription: I guess I'm making my idol debut? Um, Javelin and the others are making their debuts, so, I also had to... Commander, what are idols supposed to do normally?
skins.acquisition: I guess I'm making my idol debut? Um, Javelin and the others are making their debuts, so, I also had to... Commander, what are idols supposed to do normally?
skins.login: Commander, I'm currently practicing my dance routine. Want to watch?
skins.details: Z23 is always looking out for us... Even though she has her own schedule to worry about, she always helps us manage ours.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Singing and dancing are no problem for me, but smiling is hard... Javelin said that's what makes me cute though. Is that true, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, Z23 told me that rock n' roll and idols don't really go together. Do you think I could make metal cute?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fubuki seems to also be doing idol training. We should go see her... in a little bit.
skins.secretaryIdle4: I never knew that there were so many things to do as an idol. I'm getting all fired up.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, this is what I learned from my lessons today.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Happy New Year's. In this coming year, please continue to look after me...
skins.acquisition: Commander, Happy New Year's. In this coming year, please continue to look after me...
skins.login: During holidays, everyone always has lots of fun. Of course, Ayanami is also having lots of fun...
skins.details: Fubuki seems to have drawn "Misfortune" at the fortune-telling shrine, but she doesn't really seem to mind... Me? "Small blessing." I'm glad.
skins.secretaryIdle1: New Year's outfits... are very pretty, but they're hard to move around in... Ayanami still isn't used to it yet...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Snowflakes are very beautiful, but, they melt as soon as they land in your palm.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This year as well... I hope to stay together with everyone, and Commander as well.
skins.secretaryIdle4: New Year's isn't complete... without ozoni. It's piping hot. Please have some if you'd like.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Please do not mess up my clothes... Otherwise, Ayanami would not know how to fix them...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, thank you for coming to the party. Ayanami... has been waiting for you. ...I look a bit scary? I'm not sure I get it... I guess.
skins.acquisition: Commander, thank you for coming to the party. Ayanami... has been waiting for you. ...I look a bit scary? I'm not sure I get it... I guess.
skins.login: "It is unbefitting to keep a lady waiting." ―That was just a joke. Commander, welcome back.
skins.details: Commander, you'd like to dance with Ayanami next? I'm not very good at dancing though... I'll try not to step on your feet, I guess...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Z23 seems to be fitting in just fine, but... I'm still a bit nervous. Commander, don't leave me alone.
skins.secretaryIdle2: To get rid of my nerves... maybe I should try releasing the ?Force? like that one person taught me... Is that a bad idea?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Listening to the piano makes me a bit sleepy... Commander, you're not getting sleepy?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander... you're acting a bit weird...
